name: Apptivo
tag_list: crm, ecommerce, erp, small-business, help-desk, cloud-computing
overview:
Apptivo is a free, web based, business management platform for small businesses and startups. Apptivo’s platform has 40+ Free, Cloud based Business Apps.

Apptivo is mainly designed to help startups and small businesses manage all major business processes through a web based platform. Most major business activities like Sales, Marketing, Human Resource Management, Invoicing, eCommerce, Project Management, Capital Raising, Customer Service etc. can be managed through Apptivo.

The use of the platform is completely free. The users can choose to take advantage of Apptivo’s integration with third party service providers to get access to value added services. A few examples from a growing list value added services are email marketing through Constant Contact, SMS alerts through Twilio, eFax service through Servangle, Corporate emails from Google Apps etc.
